attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Kept crashing the whole time I tried to open up the app & very disorganized with information. 0/10 didn’t help with anything~1312

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded this it destroyed my iPhone and it was so bad it didn’t work and it doesn’t work so I don’t have the money to pay for a new one sent from my iPad

attributes.title: worst app to exist
attributes.review: came from tiktok. Worst app ever! It gave my phone a virus when i asked to see a picture of spongebob x squidward! The app leaked my address and a man dressed as a rat came to cut off his finger and frame my godfather for my parents' death! angry!

attributes.title: OMG I GOT KIDNAPED ( gen z rulezzz )
attributes.review: I wanted to find a way to support our 💫amazing✨President and this app came across. Once I opened the app, the app kidnapped me and now I’m stuck inside the app all I hear is “make America great again” and “CHI-NA” HELP!!!! And to make things worse... I WONT EVEN BE ABLE TO WATCH TIK TOK SOON😭😭.

attributes.title: disGUSTANG🤢
attributes.review: This app made me throw up! there was a noise coming from the app when i opened it and the frequency made me, my dog, and my mom throw up all over the house and now we are stuck cleaning it up. delete this app please🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️❤️

this app took longer than 15 seconds to download so naturally, i lost interest in it. its been on my phone a while and i was going to write a review for it weeks ago but i just now remembered that it was even on my phone. when i logged on it worked smoothly until there was a popup of spencer reid from criminal minds, i was like how the heck can that happen, then i realized i was hacked.

attributes.title: Absolutely not impressed
attributes.review: Do not download this app! It will continually crash, provide false information, and worse! It has even forced to send racists messages to my friends!

attributes.title: Dissatisfied
attributes.review: Honestly? Horrible app absolute garbage I truly didn’t know what to expect but it was horrible.... wiped all my data and deleted all my pictures and even took my bank info... smh.

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: This is just a bad app and apple and everyone else knows it! Celebrities know it and normal people like you and me know it. Know apple help us! Be on the right side oh history! Also if trump bans TikTok we will get Instagram so try us trump.

attributes.title: this app 🙅🏽‍♀️🤢
attributes.review: I open the app to see ✨trump✨so i knew that we were off to a bad start. Additionally, the app has such an ugly layout, almost as ugly as our president 😌. Would never download this app again! 😝🥰🤙🏽
